definition: to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello

sentences.english: To learn English better, we need to tap into the American and Eurpean culture.
sentences.chinese: 要想学好英语，大家需要进一步了解一些欧美文化。

sentences.english: Learn English to server our nation country.
sentences.chinese: 学好外语是为了更好的建设祖国。

sentences.english: She meant for me to learn Spanish through Shakira's songs.
sentences.chinese: 她当时是想让我通过听夏奇拉的歌学好西班牙语。

sentences.english: Second if we learn English well we can study abroad easily.
sentences.chinese: 第二，如果我们学好英语，可以轻易出国深造。

sentences.english: The mysteries of learning English well are just practice and review frequently.
sentences.chinese: 学好英语的秘决就是经常实践练习和复习。

sentences.english: To study English well is very necessary in the modern society.
sentences.chinese: 在当今的社会，学好英语是非常必要的。

sentences.english: The key to learn English well is to recite words.
sentences.chinese: 要想学好英语，关键是背单词。

sentences.english: A： I really think you should study English well in China and then go abroad.
sentences.chinese: 我真的认为你应该先在中国把英语学好，然后再出国。

sentences.english: Could you gibe me some advice on how to learn English well?
sentences.chinese: 关于怎样学好英语你可以给我一些建议吗？

sentences.english: And, you had better keep a diary every day. In this way, you can study English well.
sentences.chinese: 用这种方法，你就能学好英语。
为学趁年青，既学须学好。

sentences.english: Inquisitive student who adds to class atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 是一个勤学好问的学生，活跃了班内气氛。

sentences.english: In high school, Lee-Hom was a curious and inquisitive person.
sentences.chinese: 在高中力宏是一个勤学好问的学生。

sentences.english: How long does it take to learn to shuffle?
sentences.chinese: 需要多长时间才干学好墨尔本曳步舞呢？

sentences.english: More and more people realize the importance of learning a foreigh language well.
sentences.chinese: 越来越多的人认识到学好一门外语的重要性。

definition: abbr. for mathematics 數學|数学[shu4 xue2], physics 物理[wu4 li3] and chemistry 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
to study sth to apply it/study for practical applications
to learn by rote/to mechanically memorize
to make sense of/to grasp the meaning of/to figure out
